text: Arau smarana karaa, yetiya ami ibraahimaka gharara (ba'itullahara) sthana nirdharana karai dichilo, tetiya kaichilo, â€˜mora lagata ana kako ansi nakaraiba arau mora gharakhanaka taraaphakaraisakalara babe, chalata adayakaraisakalara babe arau rauku-chajadakarai sakalara babe paraitra karai raakhiba
